Name: Boundary of Deduction
Description: At the entrance to a sealed room on the lower level, a malfunctioning robot keeps repeating fragmented instructions. Communicate with it to uncover the hidden story concealed within this room.
QuestDesc: At the entrance to a sealed room on the lower level, a malfunctioning robot keeps repeating fragmented instructions. Communicate with it to uncover the hidden story concealed within this room.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Repair
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ka... Ka... Data... Delete...

Options.PlotLineKey: Why do you sound different from the others?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Repair
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ka... Ka... Error... Language module... Delete... Delete...

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Repair
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Data... Sealed... Room... Room... Enter...

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you want me to get in?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You hear a coil whine from KU-Repair.

Options.PlotLineKey: Nevermind. I'll check out this room first.

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Warning, unknown entity detected.
Security mode activated. Preparing to repel unknown entities.
Five.
Four.
Three.
Top clearance detected. Security mode deactivated.
Command activated. Portal opened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The screen dims, and all remaining data is deleted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All set. Now I should be able to operate the screen again.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Repair
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Data deleted... Mission complete.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are you here, KU-Repair? Wait, did someone manage to fix you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you fix it, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Repair
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ka... Ka...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, looks like I'll need to call maintenance again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't know... It's been offline for a long time. Not sure why it's back online now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe someone set it up to reactivate at a certain time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's been wandering between these two abandoned rooms, not responding to orders. Pretty strange, right?

Options.PlotLineKey: What was this room used for?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I remember correctly, it was a Stellar Matrix Analysis Room.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was abandoned and sealed off after a while, for reasons I don't know. It's been ages, after all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All the useful data was transferred a long time ago. Easy enough, since it was just some codes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to KU-Repair, I found this room. I was planning to use it for something else, but it turns out I don't have access.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I thought it would take a long time for anyone to figure out why the rooms were abandoned, but the seal was suddenly removed just now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, did you notice anything unusual in there?

Options.PlotLineKey: I only found some old records.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see... Sounds pretty safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lester
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, thanks for the info! I'll look into it and submit another application for room reuse. I have a feeling they'll approve it real fast this time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A brief coil whine fills the air before new text appears on the screen.

Dialogues.Speaker: Messages on the Screen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Best regards to the world that receives this message.

Dialogues.Speaker: Messages on the Screen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, give us a chance to introduce our civilization to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The message ends abruptly. The latter half of it seems to have been deleted a long time ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Coil whine rises for a moment before new text appears on the screen.

Dialogues.Speaker: Messages on the Screen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, save this civilization.

Dialogues.Speaker: Messages on the Screen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, save our civilization.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You still remember how that researcher warned you to delete the data, but in the end, curiosity gets the better of you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A brief coil whine fills the air before new text appears on the screen.

Dialogues.Speaker: Messages on the Screen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Finally, you're willing to listen. We've long awaited this moment. A chance to connect with the true reality.

Dialogues.Speaker: Messages on the Screen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Message received. Generating new data.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Siren blares once more in the room.
Warning, security mode activated. Ready to repel unknown entity. Ready to ███ to █ Ready █ █ █

Options.PlotLineKey: Oops... I'll need to get this dealt with quickly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The notes mentioned this... Recheck both analysis rooms and make sure they are the same. Hmm, I should give it a try.
